div.div: Ἀμφί̄ων : (1) son of Iasius, and king of Orchomenus in Boeotia, Od. 11.283.—(2) son of Zeus and Antiope, husband of Niobe, and brother of Zethus, with whom he built the walls of Thebes, Od. 11.262.—(3) a leader of the Epeians, Il. 13.692.
From A Homeric Dictionary (Georg Autenrieth, New York, Harper and Brothers, 1891)
